mapper.select:
SELECT xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logs_id`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsTime`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsModules`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsMethod`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsMethodPar`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsResult`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName` FROM xt_operate_business_logs LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo AS xt_userinfo ON xt_operate_business_logs.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_business_logsResult like '%${xt_operate_business_logsResult}%'
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_business_logsMethodPar like '%${xt_operate_business_logsMethodPar}%'
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_business_logsMethod like '%${xt_operate_business_logsMethod}%'
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_business_logsModules like '%${xt_operate_business_logsModules}%'
ORDER BY xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsTime` DESC

SELECT xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logs_id`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsTime`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsModules`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsMethod`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsMethodPar`, xt_operate_business_logs.`xt_operate_business_logsResult`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName` FROM xt_operate_business_logs LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo AS xt_userinfo ON xt_operate_business_logs.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_business_logs_id=#{xt_operate_business_logs_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_operate_business_logs WHERE xt_operate_business_logs_id IN
#{item}
